Carvanha (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0317: Swalot
Pokémon
#0319: Sharpedo →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Carvanha (TCG Pocket).

Carvanha has been featured on 21 different cards since it debuted in the EX Ruby & Sapphire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Carvanha cards are normally Darkness-type or Water-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Carvanha

Carvanha
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
